column1: Enchanted-lite, it lacks the spark and coherency of its superior, but it's still a cosy seasonal treat -- and who doesn't want a fairy godmother?
Swings to join films like Enchanted and Elf, but surprisingly misses. [Full review in Spanish]
A slave to formula--and exactly what it looks like: instead of Will Ferrell the elf you have Jillian Bell the fairy godmother. Lightweight and goofy.
...runs short of the magic necessary to make this film feel all that special.
It's proof concepts aren't enough. You have to have good scripts
